content.query:
--CREATE SCHEMA [temp]
--GO

Use Temp

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE Covid19ModernDW
WITH
  ( 
    LOCATION = 'wasbs://covid19moderndw@covid19dtywy3evjk25c.blob.core.windows.net/' ,
    CREDENTIAL = AzureCred ,
    TYPE = HADOOP
  ) 



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [temp].TempCountry (

CountryName varchar(500), 
CountryCode varchar(3),
lognitude float,
latitude float,
Source varchar(100) 
   
)
WITH
(
    LOCATION='covid19moderndw/dboCountryCovid19DB'
,   DATA_SOURCE = Covid19ModernDW
,   FILE_FORMAT = TextFileFormat
)
;
